maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Mite Géante...
Avec des Lasers... des Lasers Énormes...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: Why... are they doing this to me...?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Pourquoi... est-ce qu'ils m'ont fait ça ?
Wouah... !
Tout va bien, Lea !
Je suis juste en train de surréagir !
Mais merci !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: Anyway...\. Got that over and done with.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Bon...\. Ça, au moins, c'est fait !
Ah oui ! Félicitations pour être arrivée première !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: But hey! Despite all these HORRIFYING experiences... I'm still first!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Mais hé ! Malgré toutes ces expériences HORRIBLES... Je suis toujours première !
Je suis trop forte !
Mince...\. Je suis dernier cette fois.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: That's surprising! You were so fast before.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: C'est surprenant ! Tu étais si rapide avant.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: I had a pretty hard time with those fire golems.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: J'ai eu beaucoup de mal avec ces golems de feu.
Ah oui... Ils étaient pas évidents.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: Yes...\. Also that boss. I mean...\. how are you holding up, Emilie?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Oui...\. Sinon ce boss. Je veux dire...\. Comment tu t'en es sortie, Emilie ?
Ah, oui, oui...\. C'était facile...\. au final...
[secoue la tête]
Chut !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: Anyway, it was a fun race!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: En tout cas, c'était fun cette course !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.orig: Now it's time to collect the reward, right?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/359/sett.text: Maintenant il est temps d'avoir notre récompense, non ?
[acquiesce]
Oui, allons-y !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: That space bird was especially awesome!\. Loved that flaming sword!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: Cet oiseau de l'espace était assez génial !\. J'ai adoré son épée enflammée !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: Makes sense. She's the symbol for heat and fire, right?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: C'est logique. Elle est le symbole de la chaleur et des flammes, non ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: Just look at this place! It's beautiful!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: Regarde un peu cet endroit ! C'est magnifique !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: So much better than that gloomy cave we had last time.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: C'est bien mieux que cette cave sombre de la dernière fois.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: Come on! I want to have a look down from over there!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: Allez ! Je veux aller voir la vue qu'on a d'ici !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.orig: Talk to \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the southern end of Faj'ro Temple Roof.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/366/sett.text: Parlez à \c[3]Emilie\c[0] et \c[3]C'tron\c[0] au sud du toit du \v[area.heat-dng.name].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: At first the world was dark. Hence, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] and \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created the first sun to spread light.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Au commencement le monde était sombre. Donc \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] et \c[3]E'nel\c[0] créèrent le premier soleil pour répandre la lumière sur le monde.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: Yet at night, when the sun was hidden, the world was as dark as ever.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Mais la nuit, lorsque le soleil était caché, le monde était aussi sombre que possible.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] wanted to place many more suns close by, creating a world of constant brightness.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] voulait placer bien plus de soleils côte à côte, pour créer un monde de lumière incessante.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: Yet this world was monotonous, lacking dusk, dawn and the coolness of the night.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Mais ce monde était monotone, sans aube ni crépuscule et sans la fraicheur de la nuit.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: The two gods then had a new idea. They created millions upon millions of new suns far far away in all directions.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Les deux dieux eurent une nouvelle idée. Ils créèrent des millions et des millions de soleils, très lointains, dans toutes les directions.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: Thanks to \c[3]E'nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0]' efforts we can today enjoy the night with a beautiful starry sky.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Grâce aux efforts d'\c[3]E'nel\c[0] et \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], on peut observer des nuits étoilées magnifiques.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.orig: Not only are the stars beautiful, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] placed them in particular to stir our curiosity for other worlds out there.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/367/sett.text: Non seulement ces étoiles étaient magnifiques, mais \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] les a placées en pensant éveiller notre propre curiosité pour des mondes nouveaux et lointains.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.orig: After \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created millions of suns, she craved for a challenge.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.text: Après que \c[3]E'nel\c[0] créa des millions de soleils, elle voulait se lancer un défi.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.orig: She wanted to create the largest, most majestic sun imaginable.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.text: Elle voulait créer le plus grand, le plus majestueux soleil imaginable.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.orig: Thus, she started adding her eternal flame, adding more and more as the sun grew further and further.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.text: Donc, elle ajouta sa flamme éternelle, et en ajouta encore pour que le soleil grandisse de plus en plus.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.orig: Until finally, the sun had too much fire and couldn't hold it any longer. What followed was a most spectacular and colorful explosion.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.text: Jusqu'au moment où le soleil eu tellement de feu qu'il ne pouvait plus le contenir. S'ensuivit l'explosion la plus spectaculaire avec les couleurs les plus vivaces.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.orig: Even today, we very rarely witness these colorful explosions in the night sky as a testament of E'nel's boredom.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/368/sett.text: Même aujourd'hui, on n'observe que très rarement ces explosions colorées dans le ciel de nuit comme testament de l'ennui d'E'nel.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.orig: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.text: Tout a commencé lorsque \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], le dieu éthéré de la création, est né dans le vide du néant.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.note: this text, and the following ones, are based on database.json/lore/godstories-diaro, except 'the anciens' is now 'we'.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.orig: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.text: Après des éons passés dans la solitude, son désir de compagnie a donné naissance aux \c[3]Dieux des formes\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.orig: E'nel is one of these gods. The God of the \c[3]Triangle\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/369/sett.text: E'nel est l'une d'entre eux. La Déesse du \c[3]Triangle\c[0] et la créatrice des \c[3]flammes ardentes\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.orig: E'nel is the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.text: E'nel est la créatrice des \c[3]flammes inconsumables\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.orig: She made the sun with \c[3]blinding light\c[0] and filled the ground deep beneath our feet with a \c[3]molten stone\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.text: Elle créa le soleil avec une \c[3]lumière éclatante\c[0] et rempli le sol se trouvant sous nos pieds de \c[3]roches en fusion\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.orig: Her creations spread warmth, yet consume life at the same time.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/370/sett.text: Ces créations propagent la chaleur, mais consument également la vie.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/373/sett.orig: Hey Lea, do you want to leave already?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/373/sett.text: Hé, Lea ! Tu veux déjà partir ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/373/sett.orig: Come on, you should at least have a short look!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/373/sett.text: Allez, tu devrais au moins jeter un coup d'œil !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Quelle vue magnifique !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: It's astonishing just thinking how huge this place is.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: C'est impressionnant, rien que de s'imaginer à quel point cet endroit est gigantesque.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Oui. And all that for a game.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Oui. Et tout ça pour un jeu.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Well then... it was great playing with you two.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Sinon, bon... c'était sympa de jouer avec vous deux.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: But I'm afraid it's time for me to log off now. I have to get back to my studies.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Mais j'ai bien peur qu'il est temps pour moi de me déconnecter. Il faut que je retourne faire mes études.
Oui...\. pareil pour moi, en fait.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: What are you studying anyway, Tronny? Biology?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Tu fais quoi d'ailleurs comme études, Tronny ? De la biologie ?
Exactement ! Comment tu le sais ?
Oh... Je disais ça comme ça.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: While we're on the subject, I've been wondering for a long time now...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: D'ailleurs, vu qu'on est dans le sujet... Ça fait depuis longtemps que je me demandais...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Lea, what do you actually do?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Lea, tu fais quoi dans la vie exactement ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: We've been playing for so long and I still hardly know anything about you...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: On joue depuis tellement longtemps et je sais toujours rien de toi...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I know you're very quiet and all... but I'd really like to know a bit more about you.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Je sais que tu es assez silencieuse et tout... Mais j'aimerais vraiment bien en savoir un peu plus sur toi.
Heu... Emilie ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: You do know about her speech synchronization issue, right?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Tu es déjà au courant pour son problème de synchronisation de la parole, non ?
Hein ?
Lea... ne peut pas parler.
Hein ? Depuis quand ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Since... all the time I think?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Depuis... le début, je pense ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Y-You're joking right?\. I mean you hear her say things sometimes, right?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: C-C'est une blague, j'espère ?\. Je veux dire, tu l'entends bien parler parfois, hein ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: She can only say certain words, that's all.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Elle peut juste dire certains mots, c'est tout.
...Sérieusement, Lea ?\. Tu peux pas parler ?
[acquiesce]
Tronny, comment ça se fait que tu le sais ?
Hlin me l'a dit...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Wait. Do the other guild members know, too?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Attends. Les autres membres de la guilde le savent, eux aussi ?
Oui...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Why the hell didn't anybody tell me?!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Bon sang, pourquoi personne ne m'a rien dit ?!

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I...\. I honestly thought you knew...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Je...\. Je pensais que tu le savais...
Je n'arrive pas à y croire...
Emilie...\. ne t'inquiète pas pour ça !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: It's not like Lea could have told you...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Ce n'est pas comme si Lea pouvait te le dire...
[acquiesce]
Depuis le début...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I just thought you're the quiet type... That you just didn't like to talk much...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: ... je pensais que tu étais du genre silencieuse... Que tu n'aimais pas trop parler...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: But honestly, everybody else knew it...?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Mais sérieusement, tous les autres le savaient... ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Man, this makes me feel dumb.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Rah, je me sens complètement stupide.
[secoue la tête]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I'm sure it's just a stupid coincidence!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Je suis sûr que c'est juste une coïncidence stupide !
Il y a intérêt à que ça soit juste ça.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Though, I'm preeetty sure Lukas could have told me...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Bien que je sois aaaassez certaine que Lukas aurait pu me le dire...
Et vu comme je le connais...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Oui, I'll have a little talk with him soon.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Oui, il va falloir que j'aie une petite discussion avec lui.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Anyway, this is a bit of a bummer.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: En tout cas, c'est vraiment dommage.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I wanted to know you better... and now you can't talk.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Je voulais mieux te connaitre... et maintenant il se trouve que tu ne peux pas parler.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Oh well! I'll make sure to prepare a sufficient list of yes-no-questions for next time!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Pas grave ! Je vais préparer une grande liste de questions fermées pour la prochaine fois !
Je déconnais !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Anyway, I really gotta go! Au revoir, everyone!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Sinon, faut vraiment que j'y aille ! Au revoir, tout le monde !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Yes! Same for me. Good bye and until next time!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Oui ! Pareil pour moi. Au revoir et à la prochaine !
Bye !
Déconnexion
Déconnexion
... Donc...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: Emilie finally figured it out, huh?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Emilie s'en est enfin rendu compte, hein ?
[acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I still cannot believe she managed to stay oblivious when the rest of the First Scholars learned about it.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: J'ai toujours du mal à croire qu'elle ait réussi à ne pas le savoir quand les autres Premiers Érudits l'ont découvert.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: You really need just the right conditions for something like this to happen.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: Pour que ça arrive, il faut vraiment que les bonnes conditions soient réunies.
[acquiesce]
Bye.
... Hmm ?
Bye.
Tu... veux te déconnecter ?
[acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.orig: I suppose it was a pretty long day...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/374/sett.text: J'imagine que cette journée devait être assez longue pour toi...
À bientôt, Lea.
Déconnexion

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Uhm...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Hmm...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Good morning, Lea!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Bonjour, Lea !
... Salut !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: I...\. hope you slept well?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: J...\. J'espère que tu as bien dormi ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: There is something I have to tell you.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Il y a quelque chose qu'il faut que je te dise.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: There have been some...\. complications.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Il y a eu quelques...\. complications.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: And as a result you have been \c[3]offline for 3 days\c[0] now.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Et résultat, tu as été \c[3]hors-ligne pendant trois jours\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Sorry, there was not much I could do about it.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Je suis désolé, je ne pouvais pas y faire grand-chose.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Ah...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Ah...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Do not worry, things are still fine with you Lea... given the circumstances.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, Lea. Tout va bien pour toi... Malgré les circonstances.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: There have just been some... technical problems.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Il y a juste eu quelques... problèmes techniques.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Oh, but I also have some good news for you!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Oh, mais j'ai aussi une bonne nouvelle pour toi !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: I used that time to add a new word for you, Lea.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: J'ai utilisé tout ce temps pour te programmer un nouveau mot, Lea.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Alright... here goes!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Donc... Le voilà !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Wait
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Attends

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: ...Wait!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: ... Attends !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: To be honest it becomes increasingly difficult for me to add more words for you, Lea...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Pour être honnête, ça devient de plus en plus difficile pour moi d'ajouter d'autres mots pour toi, Lea...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: I am afraid things might break if I just keep doing things this way.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Je crains de casser quelque chose si je continue comme ça.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Uhm... I mean in your Avatar connection software.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Hum... je veux dire dans ton logiciel de connexion Avatar.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Also I keep backups, just in case. No need to worry.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Mais bon, je fais toujours des sauvegardes pour être sûr. Il n'y a pas besoin d'être inquiet.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Anyway, I thought "Wait" might be useful to tell others to... well... wait.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: En tout cas, je me disais que "Attends" pourrais être utile pour dire aux autres de... euh... t'attendre.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Like when there is something you want to tell them.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Si tu veux leur dire quelque chose, par exemple.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: For instance: when you happen to remember something, you can tell me by saying "Wait", right?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Ou si jamais tu te souviens de quelque chose, tu peux me le dire en disant "Attends", tu comprends ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: ...Wait!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: ... Attends !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Yes, exactly like this.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Oui, comme ça.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Wait!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Attends !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Uhm...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Hmm...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Wait!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Attends !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Ah! You mean you DO remember something?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Ah ! Tu veux dire que tu te souviens VRAIMENT de quelque chose ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Great! Let me see... is it a person?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Excellent ! Laisse-moi deviner... C'est une personne ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: I see...\. Maybe a place?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Je vois...\. peut-être un endroit ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Okay! Was it a place you have not yet reached in the game?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: OK ! Est-ce que c'est un endroit que tu n'as pas encore atteint dans le jeu ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Interesting...\. Now, how can we further narrow this down...?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Intéressant...\. Maintenant, comment est-ce que l'on va pouvoir réduire les possibilités... ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Oh! I assume that must be Emilie or C'tron?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Oh ! J'imagine que ça doit être Emilie ou C'tron ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Lea! You're back!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Lea ! Tu es de retour !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Salut !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Finally! Where have you been the last few days?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Enfin ! Où est-ce que tu étais ces derniers jours ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Oh that's right...\. Uhm...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Ah oui c'est vrai...\. Hum...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Whatever! We got great news for you!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Peu importe ! On a une excellente nouvelle pour toi !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: I'm here with Tronny in \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0]! You know, at the fountain!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Je suis avec Tronny au \c[3]Centre de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] ! Tu sais, à la fontaine !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: You should come over! So much stuff happened here!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Tu devrais venir ! Il s'est passé tant de choses ici !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Très bien! See you soon!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Très bien ! À tout de suite !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Heh... seems like you have been missed already.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Héhé... On dirait que tu leur as déjà manqué.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Well... let us discuss your dream another time.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Bon... On discutera de ton rêve une autre fois.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: There is no reason to rush it. Just go and meet the others!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: On a le temps. Vas-y, va rejoindre les autres !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.orig: Meet \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the fountain of \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0].
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/381/sett.text: Rencontrez \c[3]Emilie\c[0] et \c[3]C'tron\c[0] à la fontaine du \c[3]Centre de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0].

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.orig: I'm just sitting here waiting for my friend.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.text: Je suis juste assis là en attendant mon ami.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.orig: We just finished the dungeon and suddenly he has to go afk.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.text: On vient juste de finir le donjon et soudainement il a dû passer en absent.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.orig: If he takes any longer I'll just go on without him.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.text: S'il reste comme ça trop longtemps, je vais partir sans lui.
Hein ?\. Qu'est-ce que tu veux dire ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.orig: Well...\. I suppose I can wait a little bit longer.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/405/sett.text: Bon...\. Je peux encore l'attendre un peu.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: Phew, finally done! That was a long one again.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: Pfiou, enfin terminé ! Il était encore long celui-là.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: Tell me about it... but it seems it wasn't so bad for you this time?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: M'en parle pas... mais on dirait que c'était mieux supportable pour toi cette fois, non ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: Aye, not nearly as many chasms this time. I could handle it.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: Oui, il n'y avait pas autant de précipices. Ça allait.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: So...\. what about all the hot coals in there?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: Sinon...\. et pour les braises chaudes, t'as fait comment ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: Well... do you want to enjoy the view from up here?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: Bon... tu veux admirer la vue qu'on a d'ici ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.orig: Hell no!! You won't get me anywhere near that fence!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: Ah non hein !! Jamais tu me feras m'approcher de cette barrière !
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.note: ca fait combien 10 pferde ? (longueur ou hauteur ?)

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/413/sett.text: C'est bien ce que je pensais.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.orig: Hey! I think I saw something over there!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.text: Hé ! Je crois que j'ai vu quelque chose là-bas !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.orig: You're imagining things. There are no fish in there.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.text: C'est ton imagination. Il n'y a pas de poisson ici.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.orig: What about those jellyfish? They have to come from somewhere...
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.text: Et les méduses alors ? Elles devaient bien venir de quelque part...

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.orig: Urgh... please don't remind me of those.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/414/sett.text: Raah... Arrête de me parler de ces trucs.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.orig: Look! You can see that Ba'kii village over there!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.text: Regarde ! On peut voir le village de Ba'kii d'ici !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.orig: Cool! I'm surprised how expansive this continent is.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.text: Cool ! C'est génial de voir à quel point ce continent est vaste.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.orig: Yeah, they could easily extend the Playground if they wanted to.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/415/sett.text: Oui, ils pourraient facilement étendre le Terrain de Jeu s'ils le voulaient.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.orig: We successfully escaped the oven, my dudes!
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.text: On s'est finalement échappé du four, les mecs !

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.orig: It's not much colder up here, though.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.text: Il ne fait pas tellement plus frais ici, par contre.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.orig: Well... the breeze is certainly nice.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/417/sett.text: Bah... le petit vent est pas désagréable.

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.orig: So... did you guys find all the chests?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.text: Donc... Vous avez trouvé tous les coffres ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.orig: I think I already know which one. Want a hint?
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.text: Je crois que je sais déjà lequel. Besoin d'un indice ?

maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.orig: Top most floor and watch for suspicious dot markings on the ground.
maps/heat/dng-top.json/entities/418/sett.text: Dernier étage et regarde s'il n'y a pas des marques de points curieuses au sol.
